short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts when a new Incident is created in my New Relic account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Incidents Alerts for my application via New Relic. 

- Alerts as soon as a new Incident is created in my New Relic account.

- No Click notification via 
  * Desktop notification
  * Label on extension icon

- Choose your Time line
  * Alerts from last n hours 
  * Omit recent alerts 

- See what matters to you by filtering alerts using keyword

- Get Proactive by configuring to receive high priority incidents

-  View recently closed incidents


Note: Not an official New Relic product.
